results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows in which row n lists the base-3 digits of 2^n, n >= 0.
comment: The length of row n is A020915(n) = 1 + A136409(n).
mathematica: (* Replace Flatten with Grid to display the triangle: *)
xref: Cf. A000079 (powers of 2), A003137, A004642 (powers of 2 written in base 3).
Cf. A265210 (base 3 digits of 2^n in reverse order).
results.author: _L. Edson Jeffery_, Dec 04 2015
